text: Wild paper They prove (!!) a transformer block (Attn + MLP) running on prompt Outputs the same logits with no prompt If MLP weights updated by vector: W′ = W + ΔW Calc from attn latent: ΔW = (W·Δa) × (A(x)ᵀ / ‖A(x)‖²) Given prompt: Δa = A(C, x) − A(x) Fucking fine tuning.
